data.value: When is the best time to post videos with this hashtag?

data.name: Details_FAQ3_Answer
data.value: The best time to post TikTok videos is 7-10 PM (prime time) and 12-2 PM (lunch hours).

data.name: Details_FAQ3_WeekendTip

data.name: Details_FAQ3_EntertainmentTip
data.value: For entertainment topics, evenings and weekends typically have the highest engagement.

data.name: Details_FAQ3_Conclusion

data.name: Home_HowToUseSubtitle
data.value: 3 simple steps to find trending hashtags that match your content

data.name: Home_Step1_Desc
data.value: Filter hashtags by topic that matches your content: Education, Travel, Fashion, Technology, etc. There are 16+ topics to choose from.

data.name: Home_Step2_Desc
data.value: View the number of views, posts, and competition level of each hashtag. Choose hashtags with Low or Medium competition to go viral easier.

data.name: Home_Step3_Desc
data.value: Click on a hashtag to view details and copy. Use 3-5 trending hashtags combined with 2-3 niche hashtags to optimize reach and engagement.

data.name: Home_ProTip_Desc
data.value: Combine trending hashtags with Low competition with your niche hashtags to make videos easier to get on FYP. Example: #travel (trending, high competition) + #dalat2025 (niche, low competition) = Increased chance to go viral!

data.name: Home_FAQSubtitle
data.value: Everything you need to know about TikTok trending hashtags and how to use TrendTag

data.name: Home_FAQ1_Answer
data.value: TikTok trending hashtags are hashtags that are being used the most on TikTok at a specific time. Using trending hashtags helps your video reach more viewers, increase engagement, and have a higher chance of appearing on the For You Page (FYP). TrendTag updates the trending hashtag list every 6 hours to ensure you always have the latest data.

data.name: Home_FAQ2_Question
data.value: How to choose TikTok hashtags most effectively?

data.name: Home_FAQ2_Answer
data.value: To choose effective hashtags, combine 3-5 trending hashtags with Low or Medium competition with 2-3 niche hashtags related to your content. For example: If you make a video about traveling to Dalat, combine #travel (trending, high competition) with #dalat2025 (niche, low competition). This strategy helps increase viral chances in both broad and targeted audiences.

data.name: Home_FAQ3_Question
data.value: How often does TrendTag update hashtag data?

data.name: Home_FAQ3_Answer
data.value: TrendTag automatically updates hashtag data every 6 hours from trusted sources like TikTok Creative Center and others. This ensures you always have the latest and most accurate trending hashtag list to optimize your videos.

data.name: Home_FAQ4_Answer
data.value: Competition level indicates how difficult it is for your video to stand out when using that hashtag. TrendTag classifies into 4 levels:

data.name: Home_FAQ4_Level1
data.value: Low: Easy to go viral, few users → Suitable for new creators

data.name: Home_FAQ4_Level2
data.value: Medium: Good chance with quality content

data.name: Home_FAQ4_Level3
data.value: High: Hard to go viral, many users → Needs excellent content

data.name: Home_FAQ4_Level4
data.value: Very High: Extremely competitive → Only suitable for large creators

data.name: Home_FAQ5_Question
data.value: Should I use viral hashtags with high view counts?

data.name: Home_FAQ5_Answer
data.value: Not entirely. Viral hashtags with high view counts usually have Very High competition, making your video likely to "sink" among millions of other videos. Instead, choose hashtags with moderate views (100K-5M) and Low-Medium competition to increase FYP chances. TrendTag displays both view counts and competition levels to help you make smart decisions.

data.name: Home_FAQ6_Answer
data.value: 100% free! TrendTag does not require account registration, has no limits on hashtag lookups, and has no hidden fees. All features for hashtag analysis, viewing trends, and tracking competition levels are completely free for the TikTok creator community.

data.name: Home_FAQ7_Question
data.value: How to find hashtags by specific topic?

data.name: Home_FAQ7_Answer
data.value: TrendTag provides 16+ hashtag topics for easy filtering and searching. Simply select a topic from the dropdown at the top of the page (e.g., Education, Travel, Fashion, Technology, etc.) and the system will automatically display the top 10 trending hashtags in that topic. You can also use the search bar to find specific hashtags.

data.name: Home_FAQ8_Question
data.value: How many hashtags should I use in a TikTok video?

data.name: Home_FAQ8_Answer
data.value: TikTok recommends using 5-8 hashtags per video. The most effective formula is:

data.name: Home_FAQ8_Tip1
data.value: 3-5 trending hashtags (Low-Medium competition) to increase reach

data.name: Home_FAQ8_Tip2
data.value: 2-3 niche hashtags (directly related to content) to target the right audience

data.name: Home_FAQ8_Warning
data.value: Avoid using too many hashtags (>10) as it can reduce effectiveness and look spammy.

data.name: Home_FAQ9_Question
data.value: Do trending hashtags change over time?

data.name: Home_FAQ9_Answer
data.value: Yes, trending hashtags change constantly based on trends and events. That's why TrendTag updates every 6 hours. You should check the trending list before posting videos to ensure you're using the latest hashtags.

data.name: Home_FAQ10_Question
data.value: Does TrendTag support hashtags for other countries?

data.name: Home_FAQ10_Answer
data.value: Currently, TrendTag focuses on the Vietnamese market with data from TikTok Creative Center. We are developing to support additional countries in the future.

data.name: Home_FAQ11_Question
data.value: Do trending hashtags help increase followers?

data.name: Home_FAQ11_Answer
data.value: Yes, but indirectly. Trending hashtags help your video reach more viewers (increasing reach and impressions). When videos have high views and engagement, TikTok's algorithm will push the video to a wider For You Page (FYP), thereby increasing follow opportunities. However, the most important factor is still content quality - hashtags are just supporting tools.

data.name: Home_FAQ12_Question
data.value: Should I use Vietnamese or English hashtags?

data.name: Home_FAQ12_Answer
data.value: It depends on your target audience:

data.name: Home_FAQ12_Vietnamese
data.value: Vietnamese hashtags: Suitable if targeting Vietnamese audiences (e.g., #dulich, #giaoduc, #amthuc)

data.name: Home_FAQ12_English
data.value: English hashtags: Suitable if targeting international audiences (e.g., #travel, #education, #food)

data.name: Home_FAQ12_Tip
data.value: The best strategy is to combine both: 3-4 Vietnamese hashtags + 2-3 English hashtags to maximize reach both domestically and internationally.

data.name: Home_FAQ13_Question
data.value: How do I know which hashtag fits my content?

data.name: Home_FAQ13_Answer
data.value: TrendTag helps you easily find suitable hashtags in 3 steps:

data.name: Home_FAQ13_Step1
data.value: Choose a topic: Filter hashtags by 16+ topics (Education, Travel, Fashion, etc.)

data.name: Home_FAQ13_Step2
data.value: Check competition level: Choose hashtags with Low-Medium difficulty

data.name: Home_FAQ13_Step3
data.value: Check view count: Choose hashtags with 100K-5M views for optimal viral rate

data.name: Home_FAQ13_Tip
data.value: You can also use the search bar to find specific hashtags and view detailed analysis.

data.name: Home_FAQ14_Question
data.value: Should I use the same hashtag set for every video?

data.name: Home_FAQ14_Answer
data.value: Not recommended! Each video should have its own hashtag set suitable for specific content. Using the same hashtag set for every video can:

data.name: Home_FAQ14_Problem1
data.value: Reduce reach effectiveness (TikTok algorithm detects repeating patterns)

data.name: Home_FAQ14_Problem2
data.value: Not be optimized for different content types

data.name: Home_FAQ14_Problem3
data.value: Miss opportunities from new trending hashtags

data.name: Home_FAQ14_Tip
data.value: Take 2-3 minutes to choose suitable hashtags for each video with TrendTag!

data.name: Home_FAQ15_Question
data.value: Does TrendTag support platforms other than TikTok?

data.name: Home_FAQ15_Answer
data.value: Currently, TrendTag focuses 100% on TikTok to provide the most accurate and in-depth data for TikTok creators. However, many trending hashtags on TikTok also work well on Instagram Reels and YouTube Shorts. In the future, we plan to expand to other short video platforms based on community needs.

data.name: Home_FAQ_CTA_Desc
data.value: Explore the top 10 trending hashtags today and start increasing views for your videos!
